LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_a.title: Half Elf Village Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_a.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent their childhood in a small Half Elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_b.title: Half Elf Child Slave
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_c.title: Half Elf Animal Trainer
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_c.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up with animals and discovered that they have a knack for training them.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_d.title: Half Elf Farmer
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_d.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a Half Elf farm. Since they spent their childhood working on a farm, they have a familiarity with cultivation.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_e.title: Half Elf Hunter
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_e.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a Half Elf settlement and worked as a hunter. Because of this hunting experience, they know how to wield a bow.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_f.title: Half Elf Architect
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_f.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a Half Elf settlement and worked as an architect. Assisting in their village's development has given them a background in construction.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_g.title: Half Elf Cook
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_g.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a Half Elf settlement and was raised as a cook, and this experience is the foundation of their culinary abilities.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_h.title: Half Elf Medical Assistant
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_h.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by doctors on a half elf settlement and has acquired some medical skills during their childhood.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_i.title: Half Elf Warrior
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_i.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a Half Elf settlement and was given a warrior's education.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_j.title: Half Elf Smith
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_j.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a half elf settlement and was raised by the local smith.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_k.title: Half Elf Smith
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_k.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a half elf settlement and was raised by the local smith.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_l.title: Half Elf Genius
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_l.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was at the top of [PAWN_possessive] class in the half elf settlement they grew up in, and [PAWN_pronoun] is considered one of the settlement's brightest minds.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_m.title: Half Elf Silent Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_m.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a half elf settlement and was known for [PAWN_possessive] inability to communicate.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_n.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_n.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a half elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_o.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_o.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a half elf settlement.

LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_p.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a half elf settlement.

LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_q.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a half elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_r.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_r.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a half elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_s.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_s.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a half elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_t.title: Half Elf Child
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_t.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a half elf settlement.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryAdult_a.title: Half Elf Villager
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryAdult_a.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a half elf village.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryAdult_b.title: Half Elf Hunter
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryAdult_b.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a hunter in a half elf village.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryAdult_c.title: Half Elf Slave
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryAdult_c.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] adulthood as a slave in a half elf village.
